items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars BODY TEAAA!
items.body: It’s stretchy possibly sheer but it’s black so it’s not crazy noticeable. I’m 5’4 with a long torso and long legs so the length cuts just at my ankles with getting a size S. its elegant and classy and I’d say its pretty good quality so far no tears or messed up bands and the metal butterfly might be plastic but im not sure. Looks exactly like on Pinterest tho. So body tea!!! Read more
items.author: g

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This dress is body tea!
items.body: When I tell you this fit like a glove! this dress is everything right now!! Buy it! 5’5”, size 10, 175lbs, 36DDD Read more
items.author: JB

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars SEXY
items.body: Yeah, get this. It’s so sexy and made me feel really confident! The material is thin but not see through, and has a good amount of stretch to it. I recommend getting your regular size rather than sizing down, otherwise your back might look like a sausage that’s been tied too tightly lol. I didn’t experience too much trouble with the strings getting tangled or jumbled, and it was pretty easy to reorganize them once I had the dress on. You can pull the dress down if you want the butterfly to sit much lower, or pull up for higher. This will give sideboob, FYI. One other note for my fellow ladies with large heads — this is kind of a pain in the ass to get your head thru the neck at first. I had to stretch it out a LOT, but it’s fine now; still, I recommend putting this on BEFORE doing your makeup, just in case. Read more
items.author: Maddy

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Baggy fit
items.body: Not form fitting at all, seems like a cheap version. String also broke easily in the back. Read more
items.author: Kristin White

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars DRESS EATS
items.body: SO GOOD, very comfy only thing is if you have a large chest lots of side and under boob will occur and had to adjust every so often. I’m very short 5ft and the length was perfect with some heels. Read more
items.author: Sarah Vasquez

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Wow, wow, wow (once you get into it)
items.body: I purchased the backless dress with criss-cross straps and silver butterfly in black, size large. I got the dress without the long sleeves, because that was what was available at the time I made my purchase. I'm 5'5" tall and 190lbs to give you an idea. The dress came right to the bottom of my toes and touched the floor, so it will work for a little taller, or shorter with heels easily. This is a high stretch material, so if you have more assets, it's pretty forgiving. I typically wear an xl in street clothes, but guessed that the large would still work for me-it does. I'm not as tall or as slender as the model pictured, but it still looks sexy on-my husband was really pleased... I purchased this more for inside the home, rather than going out, but if you're daring enough.... There's a large split in back. The thin straps are elastic and very stretchy. The butterfly at small of back is a silver metal alloy. I would carefully hand wash this. The material is lightweight, but hard to see through, so it's good quality material to wear and doesn't feel rough. The concerns: The neck opening is pretty small-fix your makeup and hair after putting this on. There is a huge struggle to get the little straps lined up and out of the way correctly to put the dress on. I had quite the time struggling my way into it correctly by myself. I mean, I struggled with those little straps a long time. If I remember correctly, the best way to do it is separate and put the dress on like you're putting a leg into pantyhose... This is a fun dress once you get it on, and I believe it's value can be measured by the reactions you'll get! Read more
items.author: R R (Riveting Reviews)

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars SUPER GORGEOUS
items.body: This dress is EVERYTHING. It fits exactly like it does on the model in the pictures. Read more
items.author: Juanita

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
